subject: Self Care
title: The Burnout Epidemic
description: A quick, practical guide to The Burnout Epidemic.

hook.text: Gallup found that 76% of workers experience burnout at least sometimes. It's not a personal failure. It's systemic.

buildup.text: Always-on culture, remote work blurring boundaries, and rising workloads created a perfect storm for burnout.

discovery.text: Industries with the highest burnout: healthcare, education, tech, and social work. Helping professions suffer most.

twist.text: Organizations lose $125-190 billion yearly to burnout-related healthcare. It's not just a people problem â€” it's financial.

climax.text: Burnout is a systemic crisis requiring systemic solutions. Individual coping can't fix organizational dysfunction.

punchline.text: Burnout is an epidemic, not a character flaw.
